text: Rewi heen onon ɓee oɗon mbara ko'e mon oɗon njaltina yimɓe e mon galleeji maɓɓe, oɗon peññina tooñe mon e maɓɓe, si ɓe arii e mon dahaaɓe coodtidonɓe yaltingol ɓe na harmi e mon, mbela on goonɗinat yoga e deftere nde njeddon yoga heen kala e mon waɗooɓe ɗum njoɓdi maɓɓe ko koyeera weejo aduna ñande darnga ɓe nduttee e lette ɓurɗe bonde Alla noon yeebotaako ko ngolloton ko
